Lord Vykos was not pleased of this Megatron's arrogance. He decided 
to dismiss it for now though, but he kept this in mind.

Vykos: My presence in this system concerns you, and only you. This 
means that your slaves have to be dismissed if you wish to hear it. 
As for my reason talking to you, I think that the remaining Predacon 
Lords should assist each other. Send me your coordinates, I will land 
near your base.

He lifted a finger and Warghoul reluctantly pushed the ship forward 
at slow speed.
